item.title: Set up the Selenium Webdriver. Let's automate with Python!
item.description: These days, even non-programmers are increasingly doing programming. That's a good thing. Particularly popular with them is the automation of their work using the programming language Python. This means that we can use programs to simplify routine tasks that were previously done by hand. I've been getting a lot of needs (or rather questions) about running Selenium in Python, so I've decided to document them. Goals Set up the Selenium
